title: Microsoft’s latest operating system is an extra 20% off, now only $32
content:
Macworld

You don’t necessarily need a brand-new device to enjoy greater speed, security, and features on your current one. A refresh with an updated operating system like Microsoft’s Windows 11 Pro could bring your device back to life. Through March 10, lifetime access to Windows 11 Pro is only $31.99 with code ENJOY20. 

Access to Microsoft’s latest and greatest OS provides a plethora of updates. Firstly, you’ll gain productivity tools like snap layouts, desktops, seamless redocking, and better voice typing, all available on Windows 11 Pro’s intuitive interface.

This OS also has advanced security protocols, like Biometric login, TPM 2.0, Smart App Control, and additional protections against viruses and unwanted tampering. There are even professional features such as Azure AD and Hyper-V that can enhance hybrid or remote workers’ user experience.

Microsoft’s most up-to-date OS even gets a boost from AI, boasting Windows Copilot, an AI-powered assistant that can help with settings adjustments, document summarization, and more. Take advantage of AI power with smart background removals and enhanced layer support in Microsoft Paint.

Reimagine your current device’s abilities by upgrading your OS to Microsoft Windows 11 Pro, now just $31.99 when you enter code ENJOY20 at checkout. This deal lasts until March 10 at 11:59 p.m. Pacific.
